items.sentence: I don't want to get rid of this furniture that I'm used to.
Tom listened to the message Mary had left on his voicemail.
Tom apparently hasn't yet told Mary he won't be doing that.
Tom wished that he had parents like all the other children.
We bought our new neighbors a clock as a housewarming gift.
It's been a long time since I had such a pleasant surprise.
When I was a child, I was spanked if I did something wrong.
The police believe Tom was involved in last week's robbery.
Tom wanted to leave Australia, but his wife wanted to stay.
Because my nephew was still young, they cut him some slack.
